name: atoms (itch) (DeuxDeux)
description:
Made with ❤️ by Koyö @deuxdeux

This is my very first project and also my first entry to a Game Jam ever.
This project was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

atoms is a minimalistic strategy / puzzle game

You play as an atom and gather more atoms to complete levels,
strategy is needed to succeed but there's some puzzle elements.

👆 Touch, click or drag to move atoms.
 📱 Mobile Friendly

Visuals, programming, music by Koyö
Additional SFX by Kenney Assets 
https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Updates and new levels will come soon.
Whenever i find the time to finish it i'll release it on itch and mobile stores
